message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. I get $60, and you get $40.
Let's flip the script! I'll take $60 this time, and you can have $40. It's only fair.
Okay, Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll come down a bit to $55, and you get $45. The clock is ticking!
Alice, let's split this evenly. We both get $50, and we can avoid any more back and forth. Time is running out!
